text:
Is there an option to ditch this message after publishing? it slows me down.
Also, is there an option to publish automatically on save? Or a shortkey to publish?
Not yet, moving to it tho. Had to do some small changes, but getting really annoyed pretty quickly
You can export your existing modules/templates to a local folder.
Then use the watch command to watch a directory. Any changes saved to the filesystem will be automatically uploaded. It will greatly streamline your workflow and you’re able to version control them.
If you’re using VScode you can use something like <https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=WilliamSpiro.hubl>
once you get that workflow locked down you can even implement automated deployments to production environments via CI and the cli.
oh lovely extention. ATM working with ATOM, but i am looking in to VS
